Oaxaca`s governor URO had already alarmed international human rights organizations, including Amnesty International, for atrocities committed since his election in 2004. The actions on June 14th further ignited people?s anger throughout the State who responded, by forming the People?s Popular Assembly of Oaxaca (APPO) who reinforced the teachers? encampment in Oaxaca City.
